name: While You Sleep
description:
Made for the itch.io Mini Jam #83 - Dread

While You Sleep is An atmospheric, ambiance-focused game about sleep paralysis, night terrors, creaks, scratches and things that go bump in the night. Complete mini games to collect dice. Beat the Demon Dice to wake up from the never ending nightmare, or fail 3 times and succumb to the shadows.

Headphones recommended!

 

CONTROLS
  • Look around the room with your mouse.
  • Interact with minigames with left click.
